name: Silhoutte
description: A minimalist low-top sneaker designed for everyday comfort and clean urban style. Pairs perfectly with jeans or joggers.

name: Sneakers
description: Classic sneakers with breathable mesh and a rubber sole that supports all-day wear — stylish, light, and dependable.

name: Silhoutte Blue
description: A bold twist on the Silhoutte design, this blue edition adds a splash of personality while maintaining comfort and class.

name: Trainers
description: Lightweight performance trainers engineered for flexibility and support — ideal for gym sessions or casual runs.

name: Leather Boots
description: Premium leather boots with a rugged sole and a refined finish — perfect for both urban adventures and outdoor wear.

name: Loafers
description: Slip into style with these versatile loafers — crafted with soft suede and a padded insole for all-day comfort.

name: Macluaren
description: A luxury sneaker inspired by speed and performance — sharp design meets cushioned sole for standout streetwear.

name: Nike Airforce
description: Timeless Nike Airforce style with premium materials and iconic silhouette. Street-tested, legend-approved.
